com.ElverenGTUCourses

Class GTUCourses

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ElverenGTUCourses.GTUCourses

  • public class GTUCourses
extends java.lang.Object
    GTUCourse class that reading courses's info from file and hold them in linked list. For part 1 of HW3
    Author:
    Sinan Elveren

      • getByRange

        public java.util.List<Course> getByRange(int startIndex,
                                         int lastIndex)
                                  throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                                         java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Found matched course given range info and return list which found.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - first course index of range to find the courses's info
        lastIndex - last course index of range to find the courses's info
        Returns:
        Courses's info that matched courses given range
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there are no element matched
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the range out of size
